job_history.role_name: Clinical Research Coordinator Mentor - Quality Assurance
job_history.work_description: Project Management for Quality Assurance Review Committee - Auditor for Regulatory, Investigational Drug Service and Informed Consents - Facilitate Physician chart audit - Preparation of audit reports - Follow-up on corrective action plans - Data Collection - Data Analysis - Database Maintenance - Protocol compliance Data Management (Sponsored Trials) - Provide data management and study coordination support to faculty members and research team in conduct of clinical trials research - Electronic and paper Case Report Form completion - Organize and participate in site initiation visits and monitor visits - Confirm eligibility and register patients on clinical trials - Act as liaison between Regulatory, Study Team, and Sponsor - Extract SAEs and AEs from medical records and report to IRB and Sponsor - Prepare deviation reports - Research chart maintenance Assist in preparation for external department audits Development of departmental training tools Member of eResearch Production Support Team Write, review and revise departmental Standard Practice Guidelines Maintain inventory for over 100 trials

Ensure and maintain regulatory compliance for 62 oncology clinical trials; Investigator Initiated, Cooperative Group and Sponsored Complete initial IRB applications and amend applications in eResearch Write and revise Informed Consent documents Submit reports such as Serious Adverse Events, Data Safety Monitoring, and Scheduled Continuation Renewals to the Institutional Review board Perform Quality Assurance for Regulatory Compliance (QARC) audits Perform audits for Investigational Drug Service (IDS) Regulatory preparation for Site Initiation Visits Train Interns and Preceptors Member of eResearch Production Support Team Process and submit protocol amendments to U of M Institutional Review Board Create and maintain postings on UMClinicalStudies.org and ClinicalTrials.gov

Coordination of Quality Assurance Indicator Project (23 sites) Website maintenance Database Management Quarterly reports and presentations Proof reading high profile documents Chart Audits and chart review Pivot tables Minutes and coordination for three committees

Website maintenance P-Card Reconciliation for five faculty members Calendar management for 5 faculty members. Coordination of Fellowship and Residency programs Expense reports Editing and proof reading high profile documents Responsible for mass ordering of supplies over $20,000 annually Preparation and creation of survey and survey mailings Lead on poster creation for Pediatric Academic Society annual conference Brochure and flyer creation Coordination of Health Services Research Fellow Seminars Supervision of work-study student
Coordination of patient care with several departments General clerical duties Staff trainer

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience with project management for Quality Assurance Review Committee, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Has experience with data analysis, data collection, and database maintenance, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Regulatory Compliance
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience ensuring and maintaining regulatory compliance for clinical trials, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Quality Assurance
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience with quality assurance audits, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has experience leading and training others, including interns and preceptors, indicating a solid level of proficiency.

skills.name: Database Management
skills.explanation: Has experience with database management, including maintenance and updates, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has experience with written and verbal communication, including report writing and presentation preparation, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Has experience with managing multiple tasks and deadlines, including coordination of quality assurance projects, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Teamwork
skills.explanation: Has experience working as part of a team, including collaboration with faculty members and research teams, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Has experience with problem-solving, including identification and resolution of issues, indicating a solid level of proficiency.
